name: azure-blob-mutex
description: `azure-blob-mutex` is a Node.js package that utilizes Azure Blob Storage to implement a global mutex (or lock), helping prevent race conditions across different processes in your applications. By acquiring a lease on a blob, it provides a global reference point to ensure exclusive access for certain operations, thereby guarding against concurrent execution.
